description: a man stands on the left with his arms outstretched toward a flower in the lower right corner; in the upper right corner a sun shines rays on the man
inscription: LRC in plate: W.G. 19. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Handprobedruck. E 19 D | LL margin of sheet in pencil, on verso: Privat-exemplar.
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19 | LL in pencil, below image: Der Beglückte
title: The Happy One
